sentences.sentence: Tropisetron was superior to ondansetron in the complete control rate(P<0.05).
sentences.translation: 但完全控制率托烷司琼优于昂丹司琼（P<0.05）。

sentences.sentence: Abstract: Objective: To develop the quality standard of ondansetron hydrochloride sustained release capsules.
sentences.translation: 文章摘要：目的：制定盐酸恩丹西酮缓释胶囊的质量标准。

sentences.sentence: Results:The effective rate of Tropisetron group was significantly higher than that of the Ondansetron group (P<0.05).
sentences.translation: 结果：托烷司琼组与恩丹西酮组止吐疗效比较有显著性差异（P<0.05）。
